thread.title: Spectrio Merges with 10 Foot Wave, Expanding Digital Signage Services

title: Spectrio Merges with 10 Foot Wave, Expanding Digital Signage Services

organizations.name: expanding digital signage services merger adds feature-rich plug-and-play capabilities

text:
Merger Adds Feature-Rich Plug-and-Play Capabilities to Spectrio’s Digital Signage Technology
TAMPA, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Spectrio , a leader in location-based marketing solutions powered by content and technology, announced today that it has merged with Charlotte, North Carolina-based 10 Foot Wave, a company specializing in the design, creation, deployment and management of Digital Signage media networks since 2007. The merger will increase Spectrio’s Digital Signage footprint to more than 16,000 screens across North America and add another layer of innovative technology to the company’s suite of services.
Spectrio’s current Digital Signage clients receive turnkey equipment, installation, programming and creative content development as well as the ability to customize timing, format and messaging. With the merger, Spectrio will be able to offer feature-rich DIY capabilities and more Digital Signage program and content options while increasing deployment efficiency of its digital signage technology. In addition, 10 Foot Wave clients will be able to streamline and centralize their audio and video marketing services with one provider.
“Our clients are demanding innovative solutions to enhance their consumer engagement and ultimately grow their businesses. This merger complements our suite of location-based marketing solutions and allows us to remain on the leading edge of digital signage technology,” said Aaron Kleinhandler, COO of Spectrio.
Spectrio serves clients from local businesses to large brands, seamlessly unifying online marketing experiences and in-person brand experiences with content and technology. In addition to Digital Signage, Spectrio’s location-based marketing solutions include its recently launched Wi-Fi Marketing, as well as Overhead Music and Messaging, and On-Hold Marketing – all designed to drive consumer behavior.
About Spectrio
Spectrio is one of the nation’s leading providers of in-store marketing solutions powered by content and technology. Known for cultivating highly engaging consumer experiences through powerful, professionally produced content, Spectrio’s four major technology solutions are: Digital Signage, Overhead Music and Messaging, On-Hold Marketing and Wi-Fi Marketing. Spectrio serves more than 67,000 locations, ranging from individually owned businesses to Fortune 500 companies. Founded in 1986, Spectrio has acquired more than 25 businesses throughout its history, evolving and diversifying its portfolio of services to remain a leader in the industry. For more information, visit www.Spectrio.com .
